name: PC KIDDED Sega Master System
description:
"Pc Kidded" is a remake/fan game of "Bonk's Adventure" (1st level) on PC Engine, made with Kidded Tools  by DomKid from the "Z-TEAM".

 "Pc Kidded" is a hack of "Alex Kidd in Miracle World"(v1).

 Thanks to Calindro, the creator of kidded for my few requests.

Controls :

PAD : Move Bonk

Button A : Jump.

Button B : Headbutt
